mapper.select: select d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.cancelDealType, d.aptCode, h.apartmentName as aptName,h.lng,h.lat,h.aptCode,h.roadName,h.roadNameSeq from housedeal d join houseinfo h on d.aptCode = h.aptCode where d.dealYear = #{year} and d.dealMonth = #{month} and h.dong = #{dongName};

select d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.cancelDealType, d.aptCode, h.apartmentName as aptName,h.lng,h.lat,h.aptCode from housedeal d join houseinfo h on d.aptCode = h.aptCode where d.dealYear = #{year} and d.dealMonth = #{month} and h.apartmentName = #{aptName};

choose.when: select d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.cancelDealType, d.aptCode, h.apartmentName as aptName,h.lng,h.lat,h.aptCode FROM housedeal d JOIN houseinfo h ON d.aptCode = h.aptCode WHERE d.floor = #{floor} AND h.aptCode = #{aptCode}
choose.otherwise: select d.no, d.dealAmount, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, d.area, d.floor, d.cancelDealType, d.aptCode, h.apartmentName as aptName,h.lng,h.lat,h.aptCode FROM housedeal d JOIN houseinfo h ON d.aptCode = h.aptCode WHERE h.aptCode = #{aptCode} ORDER BY d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay
